description: This file defines the main React component for the front-end application's home page. It includes UI elements such as links to Jira, Confluence, and connection management pages, as well as a chat playground with reference selection functionality. The file imports React, routing components, and a custom ChatInput component, and manages state for recent references displayed on the page.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component for the homepage, rendering project links, a chat playground, and recent references.
